body.title: Format
Methods (alt)
body.elms:
class Car {
      String make
      year : Integer
      void drive()

      -private()
      #protected()
      ~package private()
      +public()

      {static} String id
      {abstract} void methods()
    }

body.title: Lines
body.elms:
class Car {
      These are separated by lines.
      The next line is a dotted line
      ..
      Next is a double-stroke
      ==
      Next is a plain line
      --
      Next is a strong line
      __
      You can make headers with it
      .. header ..
    }

body.title: Associations
body.elms:
Car <|-- SmallCar      # extension
    Car *-- Engine         # composition
    Cars o-- Car           # aggregation
    Car <|.. SmallCar      # dotted line (use .. instead of --)
    Car <|--* Car

    -left->
    -right->

body.title: Relations
body.elms:
Driver - Car : drives >
    Car -- Owner : < owns
    Car *-- Wheel : has 4 >

body.title: Notes
Namespaces

body.elms:
(*) --> "First Activity"
    -->[You can put also labels] "Second Activity"
    --> (*)
